    • log

      public static String log(org.slf4j.Logger logger, org.slf4j.event.Level level, String messageFormat, int messageId, Object... messageParameters)
      Create and log a formatted message at the given level
      Parameters:
      level - the logging level to use
      messageFormat - the message text with parameter placeholders in String.format() style
      messageId - a (unique) message id
      messageParameters - the message parameters (optional, depending on the message format)
      Returns:
      a formatted info mesage
